name: The Symmetrist
description:
Our game is a balance puzzle game.  The Story of the game from the begining of time people got this symmetry obsession try to aligned objects correctly.

Our theme is TWO!

Drop two similar objects symmetrical with each other and try to balance the frame aligned with the floor. Two and the symmetry is starting point for us.

We didn't make any assets before the jam or get from the internet. We drew all the assets in our jam time.

Font from Cindyyo: https://www.dafont.com/momshand.font

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/cinema-world-27

Art:

Can Badur: https://www.instagram.com/badurcan/

Kerem Tarhan: https://www.instagram.com/kertburger/
